subject: Baseball
Steroids
Decisions and Verdicts
Tests and Testing
Appeals Courts (US)
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court reaffirmed its ruling that a list of players who tested positive for steroids was illegally seized during a drug raid.
snippet: A federal appeals court reaffirmed its ruling that a list of players who tested positive for steroids was illegally seized during a drug raid.
